message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is truly exceptional. Given its unique features and high quality, I'm extending an exclusive offer for you to purchase it at $15000. This is a special opportunity tailored for someone who appreciates the finest offerings. Please let me know if this aligns with your interests and budget.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe the product is great, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?
